sentences.en: Amy had the growing sense that she was adrift and isolated.
sentences.cn: 埃米愈发感到自己孤立无援，孑然一身。

sentences.en: Any alteration would spoil the sense of the entire poem.
sentences.cn: 任何改动都会破坏整首诗的含义。

sentences.en: Behind the mocking laughter lurks a growing sense of unease.
sentences.cn: 嘲笑声的背后潜伏着一种越来越强烈的不安。

sentences.en: Cats have a very acute sense of hearing (= very good, so that they can hear even the smallest sound ) .
sentences.cn: 猫的听觉非常敏锐。

sentences.en: Employees need the sense of being appreciated.
sentences.cn: 雇员需要被赏识的感觉。

sentences.en: He acknowledged the sense of betrayal by civil rights leaders.
sentences.cn: 他承认自己有被民权领袖出卖了的感觉。

sentences.en: He felt a sudden sense of calm, of contentment.
sentences.cn: 他突然感到一种安宁和满足.

sentences.en: He sees sense in merging the two agencies while both are new.
sentences.cn: 他觉得将这两家建立不久的机构合而为一是明智的。

sentences.en: He was sitting there saying, "Yes, the figures make sense."
sentences.cn: 他坐在那儿说：“是的，这些数字可以理解。”

sentences.en: in a sense, behaviour cannot develop independently of the environment.
sentences.cn: 在某种意义上，行为不能独立于环境而发展。

sentences.en: In every one of her pictures she conveys a sense of immediacy.
sentences.cn: 她拍的每一张照片中都传递出一种临场感，使人有如亲临现场。

sentences.en: In the dark my sense of hearing becomes so acute.
sentences.cn: 黑暗中我的听觉变得异常灵敏。

sentences.en: It makes sense to eat a reasonably balanced diet when slimming.
sentences.cn: 在减肥过程中保持饮食的营养相对均衡是明智的。

sentences.en: It was dark and he had completely lost his sense of direction.
sentences.cn: 天黑了，他完全失去了方向感。

sentences.en: Molly razzed me about my rotten sense of direction.
sentences.cn: 莫利笑话我糟糕的方向感。

sentences.en: Paul is a thoroughly likeable man with an unerring sense of comedy.
sentences.cn: 保罗十分讨人喜欢，开玩笑时很有分寸。

sentences.en: Perhaps he sensed your distrust.
sentences.cn: 也许他感觉到了你的不信任。

sentences.en: she must try to make sense of what was going on.
sentences.cn: 她必须尽量弄懂正在发生的一切。

sentences.en: The word ‘record’ has several different senses. record
sentences.cn: 这个词有几种不同的意思。

sentences.en: There is a wry sense of humour in his work.
sentences.cn: 他的作品带有一种讽刺意味的幽默。

sentences.en: There is an enormous sense of mission in his speech and gesture.
sentences.cn: 他的一言一行都带着强烈的使命感。

sentences.en: This is true in a general sense.
sentences.cn: 从一般意义上来讲，这是对的。

sentences.en: Though his background was modest, it was in no sense deprived.
sentences.cn: 尽管他家境一般，但也并不算贫穷。

sentences.en: We must keep a sense of proportion about all this.
sentences.cn: 我们对所有的这些都要有轻重缓急之分。

sentences.en: would any man in his senses invent so absurd a story?.
sentences.cn: 思维正常的人会编造这么一个荒唐的故事吗？。

words.tran_cn: 轰动的；耸人听闻的；非常好的；使人感动的
愚蠢的；无知觉的；无意识的
明智的；明显的；意识到的；通晓事理的
感觉的；知觉的；传递感觉的
毫无知觉地；无意识地；不省人事地
情感；敏感性；感觉；识别力
可感觉到的东西；敏感的人

phrases.phrase: bring someone to their (或come to one's) senses

trans.tran_cn: 感觉官能（即视、听、嗅、味、触五觉），感觉，天赋，悟性，理智，判断力，好处，意义，看待…的角度

trans.tran_en: if you sense something, you feel that it exists or is true, without being told or having proof
